value:
$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... There's nothing here that I
wasn't already expecting...$k$pThe white dragon perished and
became the wind and the land itself...$k$pThey carry out these rituals for the
sake of the people, not for their god.$k$pThe Dragon Veins may remain in the
land, but the gods themselves can no
longer change the world...$k$pI had hoped for more... Still, though...$k$pThere is a third dragon, neither white
nor black... I wonder...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Loki!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, there you are, dear. If you insist
on it, then I'll play with you.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_02,0|$WmMPID_夏祭リョウマ,ch05_01_Ryouma_M_summer18,Face|That was a true demonstration of
strength. Heroes from another world,
I thank you.$k$p$WmMPID_夏祭エリンシア,ch09_06_Erincia_F_dance18,Face|You have my thanks, too. I hope that
one day I can aid you,
$Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|Another successful mission! Well,
except for the fact that Loki got
away.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Hmm...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What are you reading, Alfonse?
Those papers are in tatters!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|These are the ancient texts of
Hoshido. Loki had these...and was
here searching for something.$k$pThey concern the gods of this
world... More specifically, beings
known as the First Dragons.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Dragons? The gods of our world are
dragons, too.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|Both Askr and Embla are dragons, it
is true.$k$p$EFace_Anger|I don't know what Loki may be
plotting, but whatever it is...it won't
be good for us.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|That is for sure. We must keep our
guard up at all times. The Order
never rests!$k$p$Sbs150|
